name: Python Electrical Engineering
tagline: Repository for my iPython projects for topics related to electrical engineering
body:
Python and iPython in use for electrical engineering calculations ========= Welcome to the Python EE project page. I launched it to publish my learnings how to use Python and iPython notebooks for solution of common electrical engineering problems dicussed at electrial engineering courses at universities. So far there are two examples loaded: - Influence of voltage closing angle on the current peak in an R-L circuit during closing of the circuit. - Excitation used in seismic testing of electrical equipment. Test of entering the code to the site ```html

Example of code

    

        

            
Your title

```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
